titleStmt.title: [The complaint of them that be too late married]
Complainte de trop tard marié. English
titleStmt.author: Gringore, Pierre, ca. 1475-1538?
Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: Empre[n]ted in fletestrete by Wynkyn de Warde [sic], dwellynge in the famous cyte of London his house in the same at the sygne of the sone,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Gringore, Pierre. La complainte de trop tard marié.
Translated by Robert Copland, whose name appears in acrostic on B3r.--STC.
Imprint from colophon; title from and publication date conjectured by STC.
B1r, line 2: In castynge a laughter amerous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
